verbs.description: This very pathetic example of Trumpian pathology [V: will] make that post - presidential biopic pretty amusing . PBO as Apollo Creed ? Vlad Putin as Ivan Drago ? Or maybe it ’s about Trump ’s reminding his base about Jim Crow - era anti - miscegenation laws ...
